snippet: With an end-of-March deadline for drafting the outline of a potential agreement, Secretary of State John Kerry faces an array of challenges in completing an initial accord and defending it to Congress.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry continues to face challenges in completing outline of potential accord with Iran over its nuclear program, and defending it to Congress, as March deadline approaches; immediate task at hand is reaching consensus with France on some key features of agreement.
lead_paragraph: With an end-of-March deadline for drafting the outline of a potential agreement, Secretary of State John Kerry faces an array of challenges in completing an initial accord and defending it to Congress.

headline.main: After Talks, Nuclear Deal on Iran Is Seen as Close
headline.print_headline: Kerry Faces Challenges on Iran Nuclear Deal
